data.text: @PKFreedom1 WE ARE PATHETIC. I am embarrassed at our woke province. When will @jjhorgan wake up and allow us to return to normal? The rest of the world is watching. Do your thing and #EndAllMandates

@PKFreedom1 You do realize that BC has the lowest case counts of all of Canada in no small part to those restrictions. If you want to remove restrictions, please let us know what level of cases/hospitalizations/death you find acceptable for your "freedoms".
@PKFreedom1 Please feel free to move to Alberta.
@PKFreedom1 Hard to think of more absurd “health care policy” at this point.
@PKFreedom1 If SK's & AB's NDP were in charge, we'd still be in the same boat you are. They are fighting it tooth and nail. The meltdowns are everywhere
@PKFreedom1 @SaskLass Bye! We're outta here, to mortgage free happiness.
